website_summaries.verdict: This first-generation Moov fitness tracker provides great workout information for swimmers, as well as GPS-tracking for exercise outside the pool.
pros: Measures laps and stroke type in the water
cons: Does not track steps or heart rate
Disc can come loose, so consider wearing it flipped against your body instead of facing out

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the wrist band at all
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the wrist band at all. It does not read activity at all well. The ankle strap is better for guaging activity... BUT.... a) it looks like an ankle monitor from jail. And b) it comes loose too easily. Its in a drawer with other failed activity monitors, including a Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Quellar

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate device
customer_reviews.text: I think the reviews are fake. The device stops working aftet several usages and then works whenever it pleases. Just an unfortunate waste of money and a motivation-killer. I was very enthusiastic at the beginnig, it was affordable and could be used in the pool. But first it stopped while walking, and then it stopped at the pool and now it works sometimes and sometimes not, of course you lose all the activity data. Such a pitty I bought it. I don't even use it anymore regardless it works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off that breaks instead of coaching your swimming
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, it's a rip off. Mine went dead the first time I tried to swim with it. 4 days later, zero response from their tech support and their marketing arm responded with an insulting offer for 20% off the newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise wearable
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It records periods is activity, but not sleep. It talks me through walking and encourages me to go a little faster, although I can set my own pace if I don't feel up to going faster (I am 74--I don't always feel like going faster). It has a great seven minute workout that I can do, although it would prefer I did it faster.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Sergel

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product. LOVE having my own private coach. :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love this tracker. I have only had it two days and can already see I am going to love it. I also ordered the NOW and plan to use them in tandem. The only thing I wish is that the information would be available online to review as well. That is the ONLY reason I didn't give it 5 stars. It has already helped me as I wanted to get to new levels so I worked hard to get throught he first level. Don't know why I didn't find this before.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wow this device is amazing!! I having been running for years
customer_reviews.text: Wow this device is amazing!! I having been running for years...getting slower and slower. ..my average pace as been a rediclous 11:40..Used the Moov first run out my pace was 10:09...I was amazed!!! Not only did I run better but I felt great no usual leg pain! I can't wait to use the cycle app.. I have been doing the 7 min. Workout app daily and can' t believe I have been sore! This device is just what I need to get me motivated and take my fitness level to the next step!
customer_reviews.author: Fit at 40

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've seen so far.
customer_reviews.text: Wish they would update the software so that you could also use it as a daily tracker. I'd use it much more that way. I really like the boxing work out, but you have to start over from the beginning of a work out each time. The running one seems to require your phone with you and I hate to run with my phone. I also really like the swimming app.
customer_reviews.author: EmTB

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love love love the Moov
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love the Moov! I always struggled with running for longer than 10 minutes or for a mile without stopping, but this really helped me! I've used it for about a month, everyday or every other day, not including weekends, and I can now run 3 miles, nonstop! I really recommend this for anyone that needs help running, the trainer is everything you need! The only thing I can complain about is that sometimes the bluetooth will disconnect from my phone when I put my phone in my pocket, so I have to hold it while I run. Other than that, it's the best money I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Thao

customer_reviews.title: Won't sinc with iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: It would nt sinc with my iPhone 6 blue tooth so it's basically a white paperweight. I messaged moov via their website a few days ago and the only response I got was that they received my email........ I will update this post if they help me out but at this point, I am very disappointed with the product and moov customer service.
customer_reviews.author: ruthe a schmutz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this is great, hence the 2 stars, but the execution failed horribly. The only thing that needs to be fixed is the bluetooth capabilities and it would be great! But where it stands, I have to reconnect every 15 seconds and that goes go well with biking and running. It is extremely frustrating and ruined my workout.
customer_reviews.author: L. Titus

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy seeing progress in the app
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for swimming. I really enjoy seeing progress in the app. Although they "mooved" onto new hardware designs, the app is updated from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Alt

customer_reviews.title: Moov gets you moving.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my husband does 200 + pushups a day and he did the 7 minute workout and was winded. He doesn't add much cardiovascular in his workouts but moov made him move to get to the next level. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Lady-T

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I just took my first Moov swim. The report is unbelievable! I'm using swimming as a rehabilitation tactic, so speed records aren't what I'm after. However, the report still will help me track progress in ways I would have never imagined! Love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mkatie

customer_reviews.title: Being Scammed with a non working product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this moov from you in Sept 2015 i only tested use it twice only. Today is not working. The battery was running iut fast and now totally not working. No reaction when i recharge the moov circle and no reaction for sycn - i founf that i was scammed and being cheated by purchasimg a used and non working products
customer_reviews.author: Yin L Soon

customer_reviews.title: so nice but not durable
customer_reviews.text: i love the app and the device, but the problem is i only used 10 times or so and it is not functioning anymore :( after i updated the app. , i was never able to turn on the device :(
customer_reviews.author: ismet s.

customer_reviews.title: Cool in theory....average in execution.
customer_reviews.text: Cool concept, poor execution. Stopped working after a week. Would be MUCH better if it were a fitness tracker, too. You're better off with a Fitbit or, if you can afford it, an Android Wear device.
customer_reviews.author: DDG

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Day one- worked great while hiking. Day 2-took it swimming which was what I bought it for, and it stopped working. It could no longer be charged up. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Katandbeau

customer_reviews.title: Moov smart multi sport fitness coach
customer_reviews.text: Moov is wonderful, to me the best thing about Moov is the fact that I can go swimming with it. The exercise I do most is swimming, at this point in my life swimming doesn't cause me any pain. Yay Moov!
customer_reviews.author: Nkerky

customer_reviews.title: It's a good fitness tracker
customer_reviews.text: It's a good fitness tracker, i mainly use it for biking cause I do photography but it works.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with the product. Takes forever to sync with the phone. Battery does not hold charge after two months of use. Would not recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gauri Deshmukh

customer_reviews.title: looks good on the hand wrist
customer_reviews.text: The device is elegant and well made, looks good on the hand wrist. I didn't have chance to start using it but will eventually do soon.
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav Buber

customer_reviews.title: Great coach!
customer_reviews.text: It really helps coach you! You have a personal trainer helping you run better an reach your goals. I went on a run after months of not running and usually my knees always hurt when I go on a run. With Moov, my knees never hurt anymore because I am landing the way I should be now!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: and just did not satisfy my needs
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but I returned this product. It was large and bulky, and just did not satisfy my needs.
customer_reviews.author: wendy engel

customer_reviews.title: Swimming Away!!!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was super quick! Trying the swim option tonight. I LOVE it. Tells me how many, how fast, calories burnt. It's a great motivator.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Love moov! Using it with cardio boxing
customer_reviews.text: Love moov! Using it with cardio boxing, seven minute workout and the running app. Very motivating and fun! Highly recommend it for both experienced and beginner exercisers.
customer_reviews.author: hbb

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: This is a TRUE fitness gadget! If you want to get in shape, I STRONGLY recommend
customer_reviews.author: atamimi

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love the product for what it does. Wish this orginal version allowed some type of 3rd party API access or just a daily data screen. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great tracking device for many workouts
customer_reviews.text: Great tracking device for many workouts! They're still developing some of the app software, but they definitely listen to what the user wants.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ofslager

customer_reviews.title: I got my moov in May and it already stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my moov in May and it already stopped working.am really bummed. I haven't even used it that much.am not even sure about how accurate it was.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Will not sync with my android phone. Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: robert boerjes

customer_reviews.title: Learned a lot and made running hard fun
customer_reviews.text: This is truly amazing. The advice was right on target. Made improving mu running fun and I certainly ran much harder than I would have.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: This gets me "Mooving"
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing I out it on everythime I and doing an active sport and it works amazingly
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bales

customer_reviews.title: Poor device for swimming workouts.
customer_reviews.text: has not tracked several swim workouts even though i followed the procedure. it says it will log a workout even with phone not nearby, but not with a swimming workout - the reason i bought it. does not sync with iwatch activity tracker, which means i get no credit for the workout. these fitness bracelets are rip offs, they always have something that does not work. There is no realtime lap counter, which would be so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I love my Moov, its wonderful for swimming. I have used it every day all summer. Perfect. I will use it for walking next, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Shire

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use once you get it installed on your Iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I use the apps on both and love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have both an ipod and an android phone. I use the apps on both and love this product. Its very motivaing.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Popovic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You only NEED this if you excerice regularly Otherwise save ur $$
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Amazon in February 2016 using moov about buying one months but had a lot of trouble, but this is going to return to Korea and waterproof when swimming as little. I would like to once again return and repair eyieseu. How to find a way to continue to want to saryol Moov strongly hope always full of good things to come! Please help cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the concept but this didn't stay Bluetooth connected when ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the concept but this didn't stay Bluetooth connected when I wore it on my leg for running. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be good, just for someone else.
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement made it sound like it would track my calories for the day. It doesn't. It is really only good for improving your current workouts as long as your current workouts are the ones it has apps for.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Sauer

customer_reviews.title: It didn't sync with my android phone, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't sync with my android phone, so I returned it. I was really looking forward to using it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Isolina Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This device worked for three swims, then broke. The Moov team's response to my having told them I ruled out other potential technical problems was: the "Moov was most likely defective." - really? I think I figured that out. I returned the device via Amazon and got a refund. Love Amazon's return process. Didn't love Moov's support or durability.
customer_reviews.author: David Damico

customer_reviews.title: But has a great app for calories burned
customer_reviews.text: Basically a pedometer. But has a great app for calories burned.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Smith

product_meta.title: 2014 First Generation/Edition MOOV Classic - Discontinued - White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe 2014 Edition MOOV Classic is the first generation of the wearable coach. Discontinued in late 2015 and replaced with the new MOOV NOW which boasts a smaller, sleeker design and a 6 month battery.
feature_bullets: There is a new model from Moov!
Moov is the world's first AI Coach.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars139 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
